Configuration.Name: L1=L2=20m_lens_med_apx10_JM_2017
Configuration.SetupScript:
config.wavelength = 8.1 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 19250 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 30 config.guide = 'lens' config.apx = -72 config.bs = 4 config.beamcenterx = 92.94 config.beamcenterz = 92.42
config.drive()
